meanings.def: to show an image of somebody/something in a picture
examples: depict somebody/something (as somebody/something) a painting depicting the Virgin and Child
depict somebody/something doing something The artist had depicted her lying on a bed.
The carving clearly depicts a dragon inside a circle.
The panels depict scenes from the life of St Ursula.

meanings.def: to describe something in words, or give an impression of something in words or with a picture
examples: depict somebody/something The novel depicts French society in the 1930s.
depict somebody/something as somebody/something The advertisements depicted smoking as glamorous and attractive.
